author: Special Correspondent
text:
The district level monitoring and review committee (DLMRC) meeting of the Salem District Central Cooperative Bank held here recently discussed the steps to be taken for achieving the targets in different categories.

Achieve targets

R. Elangovan, chairman of the bank, who presided over the meeting, urged all branches of the bank and the primary agricultural cooperative societies to achieve the targets in sanctioning loans on monthly basis. They should also take effective steps for the collection of loan dues without default. Referring to the applications received from the people for Amma micro credit, Mr. Elangovan directed the officials to verify the applications and take steps to sanction the loans to all the eligible people.

The meeting discussed provision of special funds to the primary agricultural cooperative banks for the provision of jewel loan to needed members.
